alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 10:26PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Benewah, northeastern Whitman and southeastern Spokane Counties through 1000 PM PDT... At 926 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Plummer, or 23 miles west of St. Maries, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tekoa, Fairfield, Rockford, Latah, and Waverly. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
